alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:22AM CDT until July 21 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 822 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pinnacle Mountain State Park, or near Maumelle, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Shannon Hills... Argenta... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Morgan... Marche... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Roland in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Protho Junction... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
